section.title: Requirements Version 0.2.0
section.para: The objective of this iteration is to implement the core editing functionality for audio events.

listitem.para: Implement the fundamental editing operations supported by the Object Selection tool that apply to audio events.
Implement the fundamental editing operations supported by the Select tool that apply to audio events.
Implement the fundamental editing operations supported by the Range tool that apply to audio events.
Implement the fundamental editing operations supported by the Split tool that apply to audio events.

section.para: Support for non-destructive spliting and joining of audio events. This will mean introducting audio parts.

listitem.para: Remove selected audio events from audio tracks
Move selected audio events to new positions on a tracks timeline
copy selected audio events to the same or different track
Split an audio event into two distinct audio events.
Join two audio events into an audio part.
